sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 經壓碎後的煤通過第二道篩，篩出細粉。
第二道特色菜15個才僅僅8元人民幣。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅故居，坐落於縣城較偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: I am counting how many colors there are at Erdaohai lake.
sentences.chinese: 我正在數一數這二道海到底有多少種顏色呢。

sentences.english: My second favourite dish is potato braised chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 我第二道喜歡的菜餚是土豆燜雞翅。

sentences.english: To adjust paper speed of electrocardiogram machine with the city electrical noise;
sentences.chinese: 十二道高速同步採樣心電圖機是心電圖機的發展方向。

sentences.english: I'd like to have a two-item combo to go, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要外帶一個二道菜的套餐。

sentences.english: The name of the second river is the Gihon; it winds through the entire land of Cush.
sentences.chinese: 第二道河名叫基訓，就是環繞古實全地的。

sentences.english: When I arrived at the second checkpoint it was already dark.
sentences.chinese: 過第二道關時天已是黃昏了。

sentences.english: The second question on the exam paper completely foxed me.
sentences.chinese: 試卷上的第二道題完全把我難住了。

sentences.english: The second way is in the bottle anti-counterfeiting mark on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 第二道防僞是在酒瓶表面標識上。

sentences.english: The second main course of ossobuco was even better though.
sentences.chinese: 第二道主菜是燉小牛肘，味道更鮮美。

sentences.english: The name of the second river is Gihon; it runs through the entire land of Cush.
sentences.chinese: 第二道河名叫基訓，就是環繞古實全地的。

sentences.english: The second gate is a wooden palisade.

sentences.chinese: 我的脖子上套着二道絞索。
